response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and potential for growth. This exceptional item is worth $1,000,000 to you, and we believe it's time to bridge the gap between its true worth and its acquisition cost. We are offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $950,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to ensure that such a valuable asset finds the right hands and contributes significantly to your endeavors. Please let us know if you wish to proceed with this offer within the next 24 hours. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a mutually beneficial partnership.", "product_price": 950000}
